event.title: was created from what were then larger versions of Klickitat County and Yakima County on 8 March 1905

data.event: Benton County was created from what were then larger versions of Klickitat County and Yakima County on 8 March 1905.

event.title: many of those legendary salmon runs are now

data.event: Historically, the Yakima River supported some of the most bountiful migratory fish populations in the entire Columbia Basin, and many of those legendary salmon runs are now rebounding after decades of demise.
